mapper.insert: insert into BS_SCD_TB (BS_SCD_SQ, SCD_SQ, STF_SQ, BS_SCD_NM, BS_SCD_CNT, BS_SCD_STR_DT, BS_SCD_END_DT) values (BS_SCD_TB_BS_SCD_SQ.nextval, #{scd_sq}, #{stf_sq}, #{bs_scd_nm}, #{bs_scd_cnt}, to_date(#{bs_scd_str_dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{bs_scd_end_dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select * from BS_SCD_TB b, SCD_DIV_TB s where stf_sq= #{stf_sq} AND b.scd_sq= s.scd_sq order by bs_scd_sq
select * from SCD_DIV_TB order by scd_sq
select * from BS_SCD_TB b, SCD_DIV_TB s where b.scd_sq= s.scd_sq and bs_scd_sq = ( select max(bs_scd_sq) from bs_scd_tb where stf_sq= #{stf_sq} )
mapper.update: update bs_scd_tb set scd_sq= #{scd_sq}, bs_scd_nm= #{bs_scd_nm}, bs_scd_cnt= #{bs_scd_cnt}, bs_scd_str_dt= to_date(#{bs_scd_str_dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), bs_scd_end_dt= to_date(#{bs_scd_end_dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where bs_scd_sq= #{bs_scd_sq}
mapper.select: select * from BS_SCD_TB b, SCD_DIV_TB s where bs_scd_sq= #{bs_scd_sq} AND b.scd_sq= s.scd_sq
